modName: 0_o Sindell visual advantage ShadersFX injector RL
summary:
Vusual mod, some features: JUICY natural colors, contast sunrise and sunset, Blue day natural sky, some sharpen effect, realistic glow of fire, Dark nights, day-Night lighting balance, realistic fog. 
Choose SSAO or DOF versions, skyrimprefs configure, experiment with effects & palletes. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.gamer.ru/system/attached_images/images/000/489/985/normal/tes_v__skyrim___dock_icon_by_blakegedye-d3773fz.png[/img][/center]

[font=Tahoma][b][center][color=#3D8BD8][size=5]Sindell visual advantage ShadersFX injector RL 1.3[/b][/center][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Calibri]Hello everyone!
I tuned up graphical-visual mod, using the most working versions of ENB v.101, v.102 by Boris Vorontsov with shader3 FXaa injector module + Realistic Lighting 3.4 by plutoman101. 
The main feature it\'s a definitely incredible the nights by totaly changing principles of light by Realistic Lighting mod + enb configuration. Now, you can see the difference by own eyes.. Optimized ENB & Shader setting, designed to achieve more realistic, colorful and natural gameplay. By using Realistic Lighting mod we achieve nearly real night.

[size=4][color=#3D8BD8]This visual mod positions itself as a response to receive the popular visual modes based on 6HD. Need your help in testing, screenshots, videos. When you add files, please specify the version of the mod.[/color][/size]

Now mod have some optional files, you can change effects, pallete\'s, choose version with/wo SSAO support and with Enabled/Disabled Depth Of Field effect.
With different optional addon\'s, like antifreeze ENB v.101 support you can play on middle PCs or take ultra SSAO setting for high-end PC.

Also check your settings in the file skyrimprefs.ini, optional i attached skyrimprefs settings with fixed shadows & tuned up fade settings into \"optional\" folder!

Please leave comments, your feelings. They are very interesting to me.
And endorse me:)

Official page Realistic Lighting (RL) mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654

=INSTALLATION=
BEFORE INSTALLING, you must delete the previous visual mod in order to avoid conflict visual mods.
1) Choose core versions with/wo SSAO support and with Enabled/Disabled Depth Of Field effect.
2) Extract core in archive into your main Skyrim directory with the game executable. 
3) Make sure that you installed Acceleration layer with SKSE (you can find in folder for 1.4.27 skyrim version).
4) Plug-file to skyrim game \"Realistic Lighting.esp\" and \"Realistic Lighting Patcher.esp\".
5) Extract textures of sun & sky
6) For default using ENB .102 version. For more performance set enb .101 version.
7) Check your settings in the file skyrimprefs.ini with my optional setting files.
8) Experiment with different effects and palettes.

=VERSIONS=

05.03.2012 -updated to 1.3 (Some External fixes! and new some tasty things!)
- Full overall color & brightness balance v.3 (more like v.1)
- Juicy natural colors v.2 (color fix, was too colorful)
- Realistic glow of fire v.2 (some changes)
- FXAA injector off, in next version
- DOF effect v.2 (some fixes)
- Bloom effect v.1 (NEW!)
- Specular lighting effect v.1 (NEW!)
- Fog effect v.1 (NEW!)
Enjoy!


04.03.2012 - updated to 1.2 (Big update)
- Blue day natural sky v.2 (fix gorizont)
- Calm lights falling to the ground in the night v.2 (some other effect)
- Full overall color & brightness balance v.2 
- Natural sun v.2 (color fix)
- Contast sunrise and sunset v.1
- Juicy natural colors v.1
- Sharp effect v.1
- Indoor lightings v.1 (Indoors and in caves are not so dark)
- Day-Night balance v.1 (A balanced transition from day to night)
- More realistic fog on the mountains v.1
- Realistic glow of fire v.1 (was too desaturated)

- Several versions with/wo SSAO support v.1 and Depth of field effect v.1
- Four skyrimprefs configurations for 
- Now work on realistic Lighting 3.4 mod by plutoman101
- Mod support ENB series .101 or .102 versions.
- Bonus #1: Effects suite inside
- Bonus #2: Pallete\'s suite inside
- Bonus #3: Some settings for skyrimprefs.ini inside

Previous versions: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6674 by skyarkhangel
23.01.2012 - updated to 1.1 (new features)
- Full overall color & brightness balance v.1
- More real light shades v.1
- Blue day natural sky v.1
- Calm lights falling to the ground in the night v.1
- Natural sun v.1

21.01.2012 - start version 1.0b
- Work on realistic Lighting 1.2 (RL) mod



=COMMENTS=
1) STRONGLY RECOMMENDED using only with Realistic Lighting.esp graphic mod.
2) If you using skyrimprefs.ini configs, SET YOUR display resolution, to changing iSize H & iSize W settings. 
3) If you have low FPS, change first of all shadow settings, like iShadowMapResolutionPrimary down to 2048. Also grass settings eating a decent FPS. And readme in skyrimprefs config folder.
4) Be aware! SKSE module with Acceleration layer not only increase productivity but also spoil the shadows.

=RECOMMENDATIONS=
PLEASE USE with graphical mod this:
1) Enhanced Night Skyrim Color Galaxy + Enhanced Night Skyrim High Stars by CptJoker71
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85
2) Alternate Sun Glare by isoku
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1653
3) Dramatic Clouds by Anarin
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4910
4) Immersive Skyrim Thunder V5 by Wordeee
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1702
5) Kerplunk - Watery Rocks by OpticShooter
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4349
6) Immersive Water 3 by Gnozer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3068
7) Better distant LOD waterfalls by hexaae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6161

With best regards, arkhangel
[/font]
author: arkhangel
